test_cases.title: Register with valid email and strong password
test_cases.description: Verify that a new user can register with a valid email and strong password.
test_steps: Enter a strong password (e.g., at least 8 characters, mix of letters, numbers, symbols).
test_cases.expected_results: User receives confirmation email, registration is successful, and user is redirected to dashboard.

test_cases.title: Register with invalid email format
test_cases.description: Verify that registration fails when an invalid email format is entered.
test_cases.expected_results: System displays error message for invalid email format and registration is not processed.

test_cases.title: Register with weak password
test_cases.description: Verify that registration fails when a weak password is entered.
test_cases.expected_results: System displays error message for weak password and registration is not processed.

test_cases.title: Register with already used email
test_cases.description: Verify that registration fails when the email is already registered.
preconditions: An account already exists with the test email.
test_steps: Enter the already registered email address.
test_cases.expected_results: System displays error message indicating email is already used.

test_cases.title: Confirmation email sent after registration
test_cases.description: Verify that a confirmation email is sent to the user after successful registration.
test_steps: Register with a valid email and password.
test_cases.expected_results: Confirmation email is received with activation link.

test_cases.title: Login with valid credentials
test_cases.description: Verify that a registered user can log in with valid email and password.
preconditions: User account exists and is activated.
test_cases.expected_results: User is redirected to dashboard.

test_cases.title: Login with invalid password
test_cases.description: Verify that login fails with an incorrect password.
test_steps: Enter valid email and incorrect password.
test_cases.expected_results: System displays error message for invalid credentials.

test_cases.title: Account lock after 5 failed login attempts
test_cases.description: Verify that the account is locked after 5 consecutive failed login attempts.
test_steps: Enter valid email and incorrect password.
test_cases.expected_results: System locks the account and displays account locked message.

test_cases.title: Logout from any page
test_cases.description: Verify that user can log out from any page.
test_steps: Navigate to another page (e.g., profile) and repeat logout.
test_cases.expected_results: User is logged out and redirected to login page.

test_cases.title: Login with unregistered email
test_cases.description: Verify that login fails when using an email that is not registered.
test_steps: Enter unregistered email and any password.
test_cases.expected_results: System displays error message for invalid credentials.

test_cases.title: Request password reset link
test_cases.description: Verify that user can request a password reset link via email.
test_cases.expected_results: System sends password reset link to registered email.

test_cases.title: Password reset with valid link
test_cases.description: Verify that user can reset password using a valid reset link.
preconditions: User has received password reset email.
test_steps: Click on password reset link in email.
test_cases.expected_results: Password is reset and user is notified of successful reset.

test_cases.title: Password reset with expired link
test_cases.description: Verify that password reset fails when using an expired reset link.
preconditions: User has received expired password reset link.
test_steps: Click on expired password reset link.
test_cases.expected_results: System displays error message for expired link and password is not reset.

test_cases.title: Password reset with weak new password
test_cases.description: Verify that password reset fails if new password does not meet strength requirements.
preconditions: User has received password reset link.
test_cases.expected_results: System displays error message for weak password and password is not reset.

test_cases.title: Edit profile information
test_cases.description: Verify that user can edit name, profile picture, and contact information.
test_steps: Edit name, upload new profile picture, and update contact information.
test_cases.expected_results: Changes are saved and reflected immediately. User receives confirmation.

test_cases.title: Edit profile with invalid phone number format
test_cases.description: Verify that profile update fails when phone number format is invalid.
test_cases.expected_results: System displays error message for invalid phone number format. Changes are not saved.

test_cases.title: View current profile information
test_cases.description: Verify that user can view current profile information.
test_cases.expected_results: Current profile information is displayed accurately.

test_cases.title: Dashboard displays user info and loads quickly
test_cases.description: Verify that dashboard displays user's name, profile picture, and loads within 2 seconds.
test_cases.expected_results: Dashboard displays correct info and loads within 2 seconds.

test_cases.title: Dashboard shows recent activity and notifications
test_cases.description: Verify that dashboard displays recent activity and notifications.
preconditions: User has recent activity and notifications.
test_steps: Check recent activity and notifications section.
test_cases.expected_results: Recent activity and notifications are displayed accurately.

test_cases.title: Customize dashboard layout
test_cases.description: Verify that user can customize dashboard layout.
test_cases.expected_results: Dashboard layout is updated as per user customization.

test_cases.title: Create new project with all required fields
test_cases.description: Verify that user can create a new project by entering name, description, and selecting team members.
test_cases.expected_results: Project is created, saved, and appears in project list. Confirmation is received.

test_cases.title: Create project with missing required fields
test_cases.description: Verify that project creation fails when required fields are missing.
test_cases.expected_results: System displays error for missing required fields. Project is not created.

test_cases.title: Assign roles to team members during project creation
test_cases.description: Verify that user can assign roles to team members while creating a project.
test_steps: Select team members and assign roles.
test_cases.expected_results: Team members are assigned roles and project is created successfully.

test_cases.title: Edit project details as owner
test_cases.description: Verify that project owner can edit project name, description, and team members.
preconditions: User is logged in as project owner.
test_steps: Edit project name, description, and team members.
test_cases.expected_results: Changes are saved and reflected immediately. Confirmation is received.

test_cases.title: Edit project details as non-owner
test_cases.description: Verify that non-owners cannot edit project details.
preconditions: User is logged in as non-owner.
test_cases.expected_results: System prevents editing and displays error or disables edit controls.

test_cases.title: Edit project with invalid input
test_cases.description: Verify that project edit fails when input is invalid (e.g., empty name).
preconditions: User is logged in as project owner.
test_cases.expected_results: System displays error for invalid input. Changes are not saved.

test_cases.title: Delete project as owner
test_cases.description: Verify that project owner can delete a project after confirmation.
preconditions: User is logged in as project owner.
test_cases.expected_results: Project is removed from project list and user receives notification of successful deletion.

test_cases.title: Delete project as non-owner
test_cases.description: Verify that non-owners cannot delete projects.
preconditions: User is logged in as non-owner.
test_cases.expected_results: System prevents deletion and displays error or disables delete controls.

test_cases.title: Delete project cancellation
test_cases.description: Verify that project is not deleted if user cancels confirmation prompt.
preconditions: User is logged in as project owner.
test_cases.expected_results: Project remains in project list.

test_cases.title: Invite team members with valid emails
test_cases.description: Verify that project owner can invite team members by entering valid email addresses.
preconditions: User is logged in as project owner.
test_steps: Enter valid email addresses for invitations.
test_cases.expected_results: Invited users receive email with join link. Invitations are tracked and confirmation is received.

test_cases.title: Invite team members with invalid email format
test_cases.description: Verify that invitation fails when email format is invalid.
preconditions: User is logged in as project owner.
test_cases.expected_results: System displays error for invalid email format. Invitation is not sent.

test_cases.title: Invited user appears in team list upon acceptance
test_cases.description: Verify that invited users appear in team list after accepting invitation.
test_cases.expected_results: Invited user appears in team list.

test_cases.title: Assign roles to team members
test_cases.description: Verify that project owner can assign roles to team members.
preconditions: User is logged in as project owner.
test_steps: Assign roles (admin, editor, viewer) to team members.
test_cases.expected_results: Role changes are saved and reflected immediately. Confirmation is received.

test_cases.title: Change role for non-team member
test_cases.description: Verify that system prevents role changes for users not in the team.
preconditions: User is logged in as project owner.
test_steps: Attempt to assign role to a user not in the team.
test_cases.expected_results: System displays error and prevents role change.

test_cases.title: Create task with all required fields
test_cases.description: Verify that team member can create a task by entering name, description, due date, and assignee.
preconditions: User is logged in as team member.
test_steps: Enter task name, description, due date, and assignee.
test_cases.expected_results: Task is saved and appears in task list. Confirmation is received.

test_cases.title: Create task with missing required fields
test_cases.description: Verify that task creation fails when required fields are missing.
preconditions: User is logged in as team member.
test_cases.expected_results: System displays error for missing required fields. Task is not created.

test_cases.title: Sort tasks by due date and priority
test_cases.description: Verify that tasks can be sorted by due date and priority.
preconditions: User is logged in as team member.
test_cases.expected_results: Tasks are sorted correctly by selected criteria.

test_cases.title: Edit task details as assigned user
test_cases.description: Verify that assigned user can edit task name, description, due date, and assignee.
test_steps: Edit task name, description, due date, and assignee.
test_cases.expected_results: Changes are saved and reflected immediately. Confirmation is received.

test_cases.title: Edit task details as non-assigned user
test_cases.description: Verify that non-assigned users cannot edit task details.
preconditions: User is not assigned to task.
test_cases.expected_results: System prevents editing and displays error or disables edit controls.

test_cases.title: Edit task with invalid input
test_cases.description: Verify that task edit fails when input is invalid (e.g., empty name).
test_cases.expected_results: System displays error for invalid input. Changes are not saved.

test_cases.title: Mark task as complete by assigned user
test_cases.description: Verify that assigned user can mark a task as complete.
test_cases.expected_results: Task is marked complete, visually distinguished, and completion date/user recorded. Confirmation is received.

test_cases.title: Mark task as complete by non-assigned user
test_cases.description: Verify that non-assigned users cannot mark tasks as complete.
preconditions: User is not assigned to task.
test_steps: Attempt to mark task as complete.
test_cases.expected_results: System prevents marking as complete and displays error or disables control.

test_cases.title: Comment on task
test_cases.description: Verify that user can enter and post comments on a task.
test_cases.expected_results: Comment is posted and displayed in chronological order. Relevant users are notified.

test_cases.title: Edit and delete own comment
test_cases.description: Verify that user can edit or delete their own comment on a task.
test_cases.expected_results: Comment is updated/deleted and changes are reflected to all team members.

test_cases.title: Receive notifications for task assignment
test_cases.description: Verify that user receives notification when assigned to a task.
preconditions: User is assigned to a task.
test_steps: Check dashboard and email for notification.
test_cases.expected_results: Notification is displayed in dashboard and sent via email. Unread notification is highlighted.

test_cases.title: Configure notification preferences
test_cases.description: Verify that user can configure notification preferences.
test_cases.expected_results: Notification preferences are updated and applied.

test_cases.title: Search projects and tasks by keyword
test_cases.description: Verify that user can search for projects and tasks using keywords.
test_cases.expected_results: Search results are displayed in real-time and include relevant projects and tasks.

test_cases.title: Filter search results by status and date
test_cases.description: Verify that user can filter search results by status and date.
test_cases.expected_results: Search results are filtered accurately by selected criteria.

test_cases.title: Export project dATF as owner
test_cases.description: Verify that project owner can export project dATF in CSV and PDF formats.
preconditions: User is logged in as project owner.
test_cases.expected_results: Exported files are formatted correctly and include project details, team members, and tasks. Download link is provided.

test_cases.title: Export project dATF as non-owner
test_cases.description: Verify that non-owners cannot export project dATF.
preconditions: User is logged in as non-owner.
test_cases.expected_results: System prevents export and displays error or disables export controls.

test_cases.title: Integrate with Google Calendar
test_cases.description: Verify that user can link Google Calendar and sync task due dates.
test_steps: Check Google Calendar for synced event.
test_cases.expected_results: Task due date is synced to Google Calendar. User is notified of sync status.

test_cases.title: Disable calendar integration
test_cases.description: Verify that user can disable calendar integration.
test_steps: Create new task with due date.
test_cases.expected_results: New tasks are not synced to calendar. User is notified of sync status.

test_cases.title: Access help center from dashboard
test_cases.description: Verify that user can access help center from dashboard.
test_cases.expected_results: Help center is displayed with FAQs, guides, and contact form.

test_cases.title: Submit support request
test_cases.description: Verify that user can submit support request via contact form.
test_steps: Fill out contact form with issue details.
test_cases.expected_results: Support request is submitted and tracked. User receives notification upon resolution.

test_cases.title: View activity log as project owner
test_cases.description: Verify that project owner can view full activity log with actions, timestamps, and user names.
preconditions: User is logged in as project owner.
test_steps: Observe actions, timestamps, and user names.
test_cases.expected_results: Activity log displays all relevant actions with correct details.

test_cases.title: Filter activity log by date and action type
test_cases.description: Verify that project owner can filter activity log by date and action type.
preconditions: User is logged in as project owner.
test_cases.expected_results: Activity log is filtered accurately by selected criteria.

summary: 56 comprehensive test cases have been generated, covering positive, negative, boundary, and edge scenarios for all 20 user stories. Test cases address user authentication, profile management, dashboard, project and task management, collaboration, notifications, search, export, calendar integration, help/support, and activity tracking, ensuring thorough functional and non-functional coverage.
